events.message: The claimant reported a car collision that occurred on 2024-04-28 involving a rear-end impact at a traffic light.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and verifying that the incident involved a passenger vehicle.
An insurance agent specialized in auto accident claims was assigned to handle the case and contact the claimant for further information.
The claimant received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is now under review by the claims department.
The claimant was requested to submit the police report, photographs of the vehicle damage, and any medical reports related to the accident.
All requested documents including the official police collision report and multiple photos of the car damage were submitted by the claimant.
The insurance company began its investigation by reviewing submitted documents and contacting the other party involved in the auto accident.
Investigation was completed successfully with no discrepancies found in the claimant's version of the collision and damages reported.
A settlement offer was proposed to the claimant covering repair costs, medical expenses, and a rental vehicle during repairs.
The claimant provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling and clear communication throughout the process.
Final claim approval was granted based on comprehensive evidence and satisfactory investigation outcomes confirming liability and damages.
The settlement amount was processed and payment issued promptly to the claimantâ€™s registered bank account.
The insurance claim related to the auto accident has been officially closed after payment disbursement and confirmation of claimant satisfaction.
All relevant documents and case files for the auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference and audit purposes.
